Job Title: Software Development Engineer I/II/III - Frontend Technologies
Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesSoftware Development Engineer I/II/III - Frontend Technologies - React.js & AngularJSExperience : 3 - 8 YrsLocation : GurgaonPosition : SDE-I / SDE-II / SDE-III (Frontend)Required Skills :- Have 2-8 years of experience in web development.- Come up with your own goals and don't need heavy direction or daily check-ins. - Have experience in setting up the full UI workflow - right from Dev, Test, Build to Deployment.- Are an expert in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS - design patterns, and developer tooling.- Have hands-on experience with one framework like React or Angular.- Have experience in CSS pre-post processors (PostCSS, SASS, LESS).- Have experience in good dev tooling for high productivity (Webpack, Babel, Unit testing).- Have knowledge of REST paradigm, service oriented architecture and distributed systems.- Have knowledge on node server, web sockets and mechanisms to handle real-time async data.- Have a STEM degree from a top tier educational institute
UG: B.Sc in Any Specialization, Maths, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
